verses.verse: This <S%G5026><s%> <S%G1125>is<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1992>epistle<s%> that <S%G1125>I<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>; and <S%G1722>in<s%> both of <S%G3739>them<s%> I stir <S%G1326>up<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> sincere <S%G1271>mind<s%> by putting you <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5280>remembrance<s%>;

that ye should <S%G3415>remember<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> which were spoken <S%G4280>before<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> through <S%G2257>your<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G3952>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the day <S%G3739>that<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> fell <S%G2837>asleep<s%>, all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1265>continue<s%> <S%G3779>as<s%> they were <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2309>willfully<s%> <S%G2990>forget<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> from <S%G2990>of<s%> <S%G1597>old<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4921>compacted<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> amidst <S%G5204>water<s%>, by the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;
by <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> means the <S%G2889>world<s%> that then <S%G5119>was<s%>, being <S%G2626>overflowed<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>, <S%G622>perished<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> that <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>are<s%>, and the <S%G846>earth<s%>, <S%G3056>by<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> have <S%G1526>been<s%> <S%G2343>stored<s%> up for <S%G4442>fire<s%>, being <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%> <S%G444>of<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> forget2990, Romans9 <S%G3361>not<s%> this <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5124>thing<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> is <S%G3844>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1019>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1019>slack<s%> concerning his <S%G1860>promise<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2233>count<s%> <S%G1022>slackness<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G3114>longsuffering<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2248>you-ward<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> wishing <S%G1014>that<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> should <S%G622>perish<s%>, but <S%G235>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> should <S%G5562>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%>; 1722, 3571 <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> shall pass <S%G3928>away<s%> with a great <S%G4500>noise<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G4747>elements<s%> shall be <S%G3089>dissolved<s%> with fervent <S%G2741>heat<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> that <S%G3588>are<s%> therein1722, 846 shall be burned <S%G2618>up<s%>.

Seeing <S%G3767>that<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> are thus <S%G3956>all<s%> to be <S%G3089>dissolved<s%>, what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of persons <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> to <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G391>living<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>,

looking <S%G4328>for<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> earnestly <S%G4692>desiring<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3739>God<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> reason of which the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> being on <S%G4448>fire<s%> shall be <S%G3089>dissolved<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4747>elements<s%> shall <S%G5080>melt<s%> with fervent <S%G2741>heat<s%>?

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, seeing that ye look <S%G4328>for<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, give diligence <S%G4704>that<s%> ye may be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, without <S%G784>spot<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G298>blameless<s%> in his <S%G846>sight<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2233>account<s%> that the <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G4991>salvation<s%>; even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1992>epistles<s%>, <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%>; wherein3739, 1722 <S%G2076>are<s%> some <S%G5100>things<s%> hard to be <S%G1425>understood<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G261>ignorant<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G793>unstedfast<s%> <S%G4761>wrest<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they do <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>, <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G4267>knowing<s%> these things <S%G5442>beforehand<s%>, beware <S%G3363>lest<s%>, being <S%G1601>carried<s%> <S%G4879>away<s%> with the <S%G4106>error<s%> of the <S%G113>wicked<s%>, ye fall <S%G1601>from<s%> your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4740>stedfastness<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G837>grow<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>. To <S%G846>him<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for1519, 2250 <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
